languages.text: Возмолилися к Вольному Торговцу вящие чужаки, дабы прибрал он их к себе и дал им приют и защиту, аки челядинам своим. Молвили они: "Долго мы скиталися, быстро бежали, семижды семь раз мук претерпели, погребли в варпе отцов и сынов своих. Несть в нас мочи дальше бежати".

The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."
languages.original_text: Возмолилися к Вольному Торговцу вящие чужаки, дабы прибрал он их к себе и дал им приют и защиту, аки челядинам своим. Молвили они: "Долго мы скиталися, быстро бежали, семижды семь раз мук претерпели, погребли в варпе отцов и сынов своих. Несть в нас мочи дальше бежати".

And spake they saying, "Long have we wandered, swiftly have we fled; by many a woe and ordeal befallen, of many a father and son bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

languages.text: Los visitantes, cuyos números eran grandiosos, suplicaron a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que los acogiera, que les diera refugio y protección como a sus otros siervos. Tales fueron sus palabras: «Largo tiempo hemos vagado, rápidamente hemos huido, y muchas son las penurias y calamidades que hemos sufrido. Son numerosos los padres e hijos que ya no están con nosotros. Y ahora la disformidad nos arrebata las pocas fuerzas que nos quedan. Incapaces somos ya de huir».
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

traits.locale_text: Los visitantes, cuyos números eran grandiosos, suplicaron a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que los acogiera, que les diera refugio y protección como a sus otros siervos. Tales fueron sus palabras: «Largo tiempo hemos vagado, rápidamente hemos huido, y muchas son las penurias y calamidades que hemos sufrido. Son numerosos los padres e hijos que ya no están con nosotros. Y ahora la disformidad nos arrebata las pocas fuerzas que nos quedan. Incapaces somos ya de huir».

languages.text: 为数众多的外来者恳求行商浪人收留他们，希望{mf|他|她}能像对待自己的仆人一样， 赐予他们庇护与安宁。他们说：“我们流浪了太久，也逃了太远。我们遭遇了无数不幸与苦难，失去了众多亲人。如今，亚空间夺走了我们最后的力量，我们已经无处可逃了。”
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

traits.locale_text: 为数众多的外来者恳求行商浪人收留他们，希望{mf|他|她}能像对待自己的仆人一样， 赐予他们庇护与安宁。他们说：“我们流浪了太久，也逃了太远。我们遭遇了无数不幸与苦难，失去了众多亲人。如今，亚空间夺走了我们最后的力量，我们已经无处可逃了。”

languages.text: 恐ろしい数の侵入者達は、自分達をどこか身を守れる場所に連れて行き、従者として守って欲しいと自由開拓者に懇願した。そして続けて「私たちは長い間彷徨ってきました。素早く逃げてきた。多くの災いと試練が私たちに降りかかって、多くの父と息子が奪われた。今や、歪みは私達の最後の力にまで奪おうとしている。もはや、逃げることはできないのです」
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

traits.locale_text: 恐ろしい数の侵入者達は、自分達をどこか身を守れる場所に連れて行き、従者として守って欲しいと自由開拓者に懇願した。そして続けて「私たちは長い間彷徨ってきました。素早く逃げてきた。多くの災いと試練が私たちに降りかかって、多くの父と息子が奪われた。今や、歪みは私達の最後の力にまで奪おうとしている。もはや、逃げることはできないのです」

languages.text: Die Fremden, reich an der Zahl, flehten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an, sie aufzunehmen und ihnen Unterkunft und Schutz zu gewähren wie für {mf|seine|ihre} eigenen Diener. Und sie sprachen: "Lange sind wir gewandert, rasch sind wir geflohen, mancher Unbill und Tortur sind wir begegnet, viele Väter und Söhne haben wir verloren. Nun hat der Warp uns unsere letzte Kraft genommen, und wir können nicht mehr fliehen."
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

traits.locale_text: Die Fremden, reich an der Zahl, flehten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an, sie aufzunehmen und ihnen Unterkunft und Schutz zu gewähren wie für {mf|seine|ihre} eigenen Diener. Und sie sprachen: "Lange sind wir gewandert, rasch sind wir geflohen, mancher Unbill und Tortur sind wir begegnet, viele Väter und Söhne haben wir verloren. Nun hat der Warp uns unsere letzte Kraft genommen, und wir können nicht mehr fliehen."

languages.text: Les étrangers, dont le nombre est prodigieux, supplient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de les accueillir parmi ses serviteurs, de leur apporter secours et protection. « Longtemps avons-nous erré, déclament-ils. Nous avons fui la calamité, mais celle-ci nous a poursuivis sans relâche et nous avons perdu nombre de nos fils et de nos pères. Désormais, le Warp a emporté nos dernières forces, notre périple s'achève ici. »
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."

traits.locale_text: Les étrangers, dont le nombre est prodigieux, supplient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de les accueillir parmi ses serviteurs, de leur apporter secours et protection. « Longtemps avons-nous erré, déclament-ils. Nous avons fui la calamité, mais celle-ci nous a poursuivis sans relâche et nous avons perdu nombre de nos fils et de nos pères. Désormais, le Warp a emporté nos dernières forces, notre périple s'achève ici. »

languages.text: Sayıca çok fazla olan yabancılar, Hür Tacir'e onları maiyetine alması, hizmetkârları yapıp onlara barınak ve koruma sağlaması için yalvardı. Dediler ki: "Uzunca bir zaman amaçsızca dolandık, hızlı bir şekilde kaçtık, sayısız dert ve çile çöktü üzerimize. Sayısız baba, oğlunun; oğul, babanın elinden alındı. Şimdi de öteboyut, son gücümüzü elimizden aldı. Daha fazla kaçmayacağız."
languages.original_text: The strangers, prodigious in number, beseeched the Rogue Trader to take them in and give them shelter and protection as to {mf|his|her} own servants. And spake they, saying, "Long have we wandered; swiftly have we fled; many a woe and ordeal has befallen us; of many a father and son are we bereft. Now the warp hath taken the last of our strength, and we shall flee no more."
